question: Which Indian sportsperson won the BBC Indian Sportswoman of the Year award for 2020?
explanation:
Indian Ace Chess player Koneru Humpy won the BBC India Sportswoman of the Year award for 2020. The award was based on a public vote.
Humpy beat sprinter Dutee Chand, shooter Manu Bhaker, wrestler Vinesh Phogat and hockey captain Rani Rampal. Humpy won the World Rapid Chess Championship in December 2019 after a two-year maternity break. She also won the Cairns Cup in 2020.
